**Item #:** SCP-8183

**Speshial Containemnt Procedures:** SCP-8283 is hedl inside a simlpe wooden box in ste-19, at Dr. Staurt Pjerson's office, under his desk. Dua to the entitys harmless nayure, no morr is needed, any researcher who works on he entity is trated with amniestics after theyre works is finsihed to avoid furthr complcations.

**Descritpion:** Csp-8183 is a regular sised, vintsge copper typwriter with the azertty key arrangment. the keys are pianted teal with black leters using a font simila to Times newroman. Directlu using cp-883 also results in nnormal text.

If any sentint bieng with the aability to write thinks of, touches, or loks at scp- any text the subjct creats wil have an excessve ammount of typoes. the efffect also seems to degrade the subjects literari skills, however ths is unnown.

**Addedum:** This entity was found hwen a vintag collecter experinced it's anomals effect and visited a docter. After finding no reslt in their treathmint, the shopovner decided to post a videoe online, with the entitiy in the background which resulted in aroun 1000 people to experience the sane affect as they wer thinknig of the viseo, and in trun the aanomaly.

The shopowner was later questioned by an unamed scientist form teh foundation. After a long searh it was discovered that the typewrtier was the casue.

The originae owner of tha entity was payed the desired price for the typwriter and treated with amniestics to for get about it.
